text: We'll have a video call to ensure I understand exactly what you are looking for so I can meet or exceed your expectations on the final product
I'll provide a proposal of work to be completed so we are both in agreement on what will be done, and a timeframe in which the work will be completed
I'll deliver a first draft of the product for your review. You can check this over and come back with any notes on items you want to adjust or update
After implementing your revisions, you'll receive your final product, up and running.
